headline: NVIDIA to Open Vietnam R&D Center to Bolster AI Development
summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., Dec. 05, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- NVIDIA announced today it is opening its first Vietnam research and development center, signaling its confidence in the country’s bright artificial intelligence future. The company is collaborating with the Vietnamese government to establish its new Vietnam Research and Development Center focused on AI. headline: Italian startup iGenius and Nvidia to build major AI system
summary: Italian startup iGenius and Nvidia on Thursday said they are planning to bring online one of the world's biggest deployments of Nvidia's newest servers by the middle of next year in a data center in southern Italy.  iGenius is building a data center that will house about 80 of Nvidia's most powerful servers, called GB200 NVL72 machines, each with 72 of the tech company's "Blackwell" chips in them.

raw.headline: Italian startup iGenius and Nvidia to build major AI system
raw.summary: Italian startup iGenius and Nvidia on Thursday said they are planning to bring online one of the world's biggest deployments of Nvidia's newest servers by the middle of next year in a data center in southern Italy.  iGenius is building a data center that will house about 80 of Nvidia's most powerful servers, called GB200 NVL72 machines, each with 72 of the tech company's "Blackwell" chips in them.
